name: TORU (itch)
description:
Toru - this is a platformer  with bullethell elements, where you have to show your reaction and agility skills to dodge all enemy shells, as well as defeat enemies with well-aimed throws Combat mechanics inspired by the old game about Chip 'n Dale, where you had to throw boxes at your opponents The demo version includes: - Complete prologue with a plot 
- One playable level filled with completed mechanics
- 6 levels total 
- Rank system
